4_crew_ulr.note: ULR operations require DGCA city-pair approval and operator-specific scheme.

notes.conversion: Original minute-based values were converted to hours to match the legality engine's expected keys (max_fdp_hours / max_flight_time_hours).
notes.caveat: For any site-specific operator scheme or approved FRMS values, place overrides in a separate rules file (e.g., 'operator_overrides.json') so the merge loader can pick them up later.
